== Fido Bluetooth dial-up networking ==
This information complements the more generic BluetoothDialup guide.

=== Configuration files ===
The <code>/etc/ppp/peers/FidoBluetooth</code> files looks like this:
<pre>
debug
noauth
connect "/usr/sbin/chat -v -f /etc/chatscripts/FidoGPRS"
usepeerdns
/dev/rfcomm1 115200
defaultroute
crtscts
lcp-echo-failure 0
user "fido"
password "fido"
</pre>

The corresponding <code>/etc/chatscripts/FidoGPRS</code> is:
<pre>
TIMEOUT 35
ECHO    ON
ABORT   '\nBUSY\r'
ABORT   '\nERROR\r'
ABORT   '\nNO ANSWER\r'
ABORT   '\nNO CARRIER\r'
ABORT   '\nNO DIALTONE\r'
ABORT   '\nRINGING\r\n\r\nRINGING\r'
''      \rAT
OK      'AT+CGDCONT=2,"IP","internet.fido.ca"'
OK      ATD*99***2#
CONNECT ""
</pre>

=== Confirmed working phones ===
* Sony Ericsson K610a
